text: Let's just put this out there : Chrissy Teigen is mom # goals. We're sure her one - year - old daughter, Luna, would agree! The model and cookbook author is a total ace when it comes to picking out Halloween costumes ; she's an expert with kiddie hairstyles ; and her mommy - and - me looks are decked in avocados. And, Teigen's inventive sense of style stays strong when she has a bun in the oven. As we saw when she was pregnant with little Luna, Teigen is an expert at turning up the glam factor on maternity style.
